sentences.en: At the age of fourteen John really began to sprout up.
sentences.cn: 约翰在14岁时真正开始发育.

sentences.en: It only takes a few days for beans to sprout.
sentences.cn: 豆子只要几天就能发芽。

sentences.en: It takes about a week for the seeds to sprout.
sentences.cn: 这些种子大约要一周后才会发芽.

sentences.en: Leaf-shoots were beginning to sprout on the hawthorn.
sentences.cn: 山楂树上开始长出叶芽。

sentences.en: Move the pots outside when the seeds begin to sprout.
sentences.cn: 种子开始发芽时把盆搬到外面去。

sentences.en: Normal Fried Rice Ingredients: Bean Sprout, Char Siew, Crabstick & Sausage.
sentences.cn: 普通炒饭配料: 豆芽 、 叉烧 、 蟹肉 、 香肠.

sentences.en: Six smaller eyes on stalks sprout from the top of its body.
sentences.cn: 它的躯体上伸出六条末端有小眼睛的眼梗.

sentences.en: The seeds sprout into small, hairlike seedings.
sentences.cn: 种子发育成小小的 、 毛茸茸的幼苗.

sentences.en: Trees were starting to sprout new leaves.
TYPICAL USE : After a spring rain, leaves began to sprout from trees.
sentences.cn: 一场小小的春雨后, 树木开始长出新芽.

sentences.en: When do deer first sprout horns?
sentences.cn: 鹿在多大的时候开始长出角?

sentences.en: When do we sprout hair and pointy ears?
sentences.cn: 当我们头发变多,耳朵变尖的时候?

sentences.en: When the seedlings sprout, uncover the tray.
sentences.cn: 秧苗发芽后，就把盘子上的盖子拿掉。

sentences.en: When you sprout seeds their nutritional content increases.
sentences.cn: 让种子发芽后，其营养含量会提高。

sentences.en: Your teaching will sprout and someday become strong trees.
sentences.cn: 您的教导定会使种子发芽并长成大树.

trans.tran_cn: 幼芽，新梢，[植]球芽甘蓝，幼苗状物，年轻人，美俚〉后代
trans.tran_en: a small green vegetable like a very small  cabbage
if vegetables, seeds, or plants sprout, they start to grow, producing  shoots  ,  buds  , or leaves
if vegetables, seeds, or plants sprout, they start to grow, producing  shoots  ,  buds  , or leaves
if vegetables, seeds, or plants sprout, they start to grow, producing  shoots  ,  buds  , or leaves
